nodes.content:
Adalais,ada-talking: I have something to say to you!
Iroha: Oh yeah?
Iroha: What is it?
Adalais,ada-sarcastic: Eh... nevermind.
Iroha: ...?
Adalais,ada-talking: It's not really worth it.
Iroha,iroha-angry: You can be so weird sometimes...
both,ada-surprised,iroha-angry: *CLANK*
Adalais: What the heck was that?
Iroha: I don't know... but it was certainly scary.
Adalais,ada-thinking: It had to have been something nearby...
Iroha: Yeah, that was super loud.
Iroha,iroha-angry: How could somebody do something like that?
Adalais,ada-thinking: I don't know...
Adalais,ada-happy: But you want to know something?
Adalais,ada-happy: You are going to be the one that helps me figure it out.
Iroha: Oh brother, here we go again...
+engine.setConversation1('Adalais', 'ada-regular');
Adalais,ada-thinking: Little does she know that this has all been part of my plan.
Adalais,ada-happy: Muahahahahahah!
Adalais,ada-surprised: *clip* *clop* *clip*
Adalais,ada-surprised: Uh oh, someone's coming!
Adalais: I've got to get out of here, fast!
+engine.setConversation1('', '');
unknown: *Clip* *Clop* *Clip*
unknown: Who was that who just darted off?
unknown: Ahh well... that's not important.
unknown: All that's important is that my plans aren't interrupted.
